text:
October 20, 1953
Mr* Harry Skornia, Executive Director
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
119 Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbane, Illinois
Dear Harry:
Tour letter concerning membership application
arrived much to my surprise. I was under the
impression that we were already a member of
N.A.F.B. and had been for some time. If this
not be true, or if for some reason It Is
necessary to re-fill out this application, we
would be del ghted. But we sincerely felt we
were members of I, *E.B* all along.
Sincerely,
William H. Saner
Director of Telecommunications
WHS:d
cc: Allan Miller
Gravdon Ausmus
